nl_question: Is 'Dizziness' a reported side effect of any drugs targeting the protein encoded by the gene BRCA1?
cypher_translation: MMATCH (d:Drug)-[:DrugHasTarget]->(p:Protein)-[:ProteinEncodedByGene]->(g:Gene {approvedSymbol: 'BRCA1'}) WITH d MATCH (d)-[:DrugHasSideEffect]->(s:SideEffect {displayName: 'Dizziness'}) RETURN s.displayName AS SideEffectName

nl_question: List all disorders associated with drugs that have 'Vomiting' as a side effect.
What are the comon side effects of Nilotinib and Fluoxetine?
Which genomic variants are associated with the occurrence of acute migraine as an adverse drug reaction?
cypher_translation: MATCH (se:SideEffect {displayName: 'Acute migraine'})<-[:DrugHasSideEffect]-(drug:Drug)-[:DrugHasIndication]->(dis:Disorder)<-[:VariantAssociatedWithDisorder] -(gv:GenomicVariant) RETURN DISTINCT gv.primaryDomainId AS GenomicVariantId

nl_question: Are there any drugs known to cause 'Abdominal pain NOS' in specific tissues or populations?
cypher_translation: MATCH (t:Tissue)<-[:ProteinExpressedInTissue]- (p:Protein)<-[:DrugHasTarget]-(d:Drug)-[:DrugHasSideEffect]->(s:SideEffect {displayName: 'Abdominal pain NOS'}) RETURN d.displayName AS DrugName, t.displayName AS TissueName

nl_question: What drugs are known to cause the side effect 'Nausea'?
Which side effects are also classified as phenotypes?
cypher_translation: MATCH (s:SideEffect)-[:SideEffectSameAsPhenotype]->(p:Phenotype) RETURN s.displayName AS SideEffectName, p.displayName AS PhenotypeName

nl_question: List all drugs that have 'Dizziness' as a side effect.
Which drugs are associated with 'Nausea' as a side effect?
From which data sources is information about the side effect 'Headache' obtained?
Are there any phenotypes that are considered equivalent to the side effect 'Diarrhea'?
Can you provide a comprehensive list of all known side effects available in the knowledge graph?
cypher_translation: MATCH (s:SideEffect) RETURN DISTINCT s.displayName AS SideEffectName

nl_question: What are the domain IDs for the side effect 'Abdominal pain'?
cypher_translation: MATCH (s:SideEffect {displayName: 'Abdominal pain'}) RETURN s.domainIds AS DomainIDs

nl_question: Which drugs are associated with the side effect 'Headache'?
“Which phenotypes are the same as the side effect ‘Dizziness’?
For the side effect 'Rash', what data sources are available in the knowledge graph?
Can you list all side effects in the graph that contain 'abdominal pain' in their name?
cypher_translation: MATCH (s:SideEffect) WHERE toLower(s.displayName) CONTAINS 'abdominal pain' RETURN s.displayName AS SideEffectName

nl_question: How many distinct drugs are known to cause 'Nausea' as a side effect?
cypher_translation: MATCH (d:Drug)-[:DrugHasSideEffect]->(s:SideEffect {displayName: 'Nausea'}) RETURN count(DISTINCT d) AS NumberOfDrugs
